entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:02 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -39.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 09:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -39.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -43.1°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 45 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 45 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
